sections: Think your election district is safe from gerrymandering? A new review of all states’ risk of partisan redistricting has found that a startling number of locales are at high or extreme risk of having their electoral maps redrawn for political gain — and the places most in jeopardy include both red and blue states all over the country.
• The Senate Parliamentarian has suggested Democrats can use reconciliation to pass more legislation, but the devil is in the details.
• Biden is overseeing the transfer of millions in military equipment to law enforcement across the country.
• Troubling statistics are emerging about COVID cases in children as schools reopen.
• Biden faces pressure to help poorer nations fight the pandemic.
